MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML4 postcode area of Bellshill. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:00pm to repair faulty electrical equipment outside 44 Glebe Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20pm on 30th April 2021.
